EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Hello from Thea @ TAS: Elavon New Hire Paperwork (1312469140.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Ashley,
Thanks for the calls yesterday. As I mentioned, we would be comfortable signing the contract without the revision in Article 8 to avoid any concerns expressed by TAS and also enable you to work through MBO on this project. Please let me know how your conversation goes with Thea.
Thanks,
Steve
From: A DCruz [mailto:dcruz_a@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2011 9:52 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Fw: Hello from Thea @ TAS: Elavon New Hire Paperwork
----- Forwarded Message ----- From: Thea Bensel <thea@tas-inc.com> To: dcruz_a@yahoo.com Sent: Monday, August 1, 2011 4:41 PM Subject: Hello from Thea @ TAS: Elavon New Hire Paperwork Ashley,
It was a pleasure speaking with you! Please find the new-hire paperwork discussed, attached. Kindly review, sign and scan back. If you have any questions, feel free to call me at (678) 650-0610. Thanks!
Regards,
Thea Bensel Recruiting Manager
C: (678) 650-0610 | F: (404) 329 0021 | thea@tas-inc.com Trans Atlantic Systems | www.tas-inc.com 1945 Cliff Valley Way, Suite 270, Atlanta, GA 30329
